data.title: China's CanSino Pushing for Early Authorization for COVID-19 Vaccine
data.text: It has already been granted permission for use by the Chinese military.

data.title: Moderna in Talks to Sell 40 Million Coronavirus Vaccine Doses to Japan
data.text: Investors will want to keep an eye on what price the biotech can fetch for its vaccine.

data.title: Coronavirus vaccine: Moderna is in talks with Japan for 40 million doses of COVID-19 vaccine
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Ines Ferre reports on Japan purchasing 40 million doses of a COVID-19 vaccine from Moderna.

data.title: Moderna Updates: Favorable Data In Older Participants, E.U. Supply Deal
data.text: Moderna, a frontrunner in the development of a Covid-19 vaccine, saw its stock rally by close to 10% over the last two days. Below we provide a quick update on some of the recent developments for the company.

data.title: Moderna in talks to supply Japan with 40 million doses of COVID-19 vaccine
data.text: Moderna MRNA, -3.50% said it's in talks with the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare of Japan to potentially purchase 40 million or more doses of mRNA-127, its COVID-19 vaccine.

data.title: Moderna Confirms Discussions with the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare to Supply Japan with 40 Million Doses of mRNA Vaccine Against COVID-19 (mRNA-1273)
data.text: CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Moderna confirms discussions with MHLW to supply Japan with 40 million doses of mRNA vaccine against COVID-19 (mRNA-1273)

data.title: How Moderna Will Fare After Posting Strong Clinical Results
